website_summaries.verdict: This book is focused on high fat with positive results that appeal to many who love bacon and other meats.
pros: Readers report not only weight loss, but also a decrease in sugar cravings
One of the more extreme diet plans, focusing on a higher fat content than other sources
We love that the recipes can be modified per one's tastes
cons: Measurements may be off in some recipes

customer_reviews.title: Publisher error - do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This publisher reprinted the soft cover of this book and used the correct cover but the content of the book is from another Rockridge title called "clean eating". These are NOT ketogenic recipes. Even the ISBN number is wrong. What a huge mistake.
customer_reviews.author: KMcCurry

customer_reviews.title: Great Recipes, but don't trust the macros!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of great recipes in here, but how has no one noticed that the nutritional information is wrong on SO many recipes? Take the blueberry avocado smoothie for example. 1/2c blueberries, whole avocado, 1/2 cup unsweetened almond milk--makes 2 servings. Book lists this as 0.9 carbs, 0 fiber, so 0.9 net carbs. HUH? A 1/4c of blueberries has 3 net carbs, 1/2 avocado has a couple... This recipe has at least 4. When you're sticking to 20 a day, that kind of error matters. And there are a lot of mistakes like this.
customer_reviews.author: acm126

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong book
customer_reviews.text: The cover is the correct book, but the inside is for a completely different book called "Clean Eating Made Simple." It looks like I'm not the only one who received the wrong book.
customer_reviews.author: Austin S.

customer_reviews.title: The macros for the meals are way way off!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a bad review because the recipe's macro are way off,and they put me out of ketosis. One in particular was the waffles with whip cream. When you divide that meal up by two people it put you at about 50 gram of carbs per serving! Unless they are talking about a 1/3, 1/3,1/3 of a tablespoon, they are giving a 1/3,1/3,1/3 a cup of the 3 flours. I tallied this up a couple of days because my wife questions this. I guess this is what i get for taking their word for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ketogenic is the way to go!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been eating a ketogenic diet for 3 years and have lost 55 pounds. I had my annual physical this week and just got my cholesterol results total 185, Trig 40, HDL 61, LDL 115. Not bad for eating bacon, eggs, and heavy cream every day. I truly believe this is the way everyone should eat. I'm a nurse practitioner and recommend this diet to all my patients except maybe type 1 diabetics.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with this book!
customer_reviews.text: So far, there isn’t a recipe that i havent tried from this book that I havent loved!!! My favorite are the smoothies and breakfast because I love to brunch or eat breakfast for dinner 🙌🏻 And a high fat protein smoothie never fails when Im feeling lazy! I tried it first with kindle unlimited and I loved it. I bought few month after because I love to have it on hands. You will not regret buying this book.
customer_reviews.author: Jan3R

customer_reviews.title: All the Fat You Need for Keto Diets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book about 2 years ago and I've used it a lot. It has recipes for sauces, salad dressings, smoothies, and more. there are recipes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner and snacks for in between. Many of them can be varied by changing the cheese, or the meat or the vegetables to use what you have on hand. Watch the carb counts because some of them are a little high, but are not meant to be consumed in large amounts, just keep track of your totals for the day.
customer_reviews.author: drp6149

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: A waste of time and money. Better and more concise info available online. Nothing new here.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN SANDS

customer_reviews.title: An excellent cookbook
customer_reviews.text: This book has a terrific selection of recipes with different flavors and seasonings, all well written and delicious (based upon my experience cooking). I love that it includes a whole chapter with recipes for condiments, sauces, and dressings. The author has also included a page with several conversion tables of U.S. to metric equivalents in the back. There is a brief section in the front given to discussion of ketosis, foods to avoid, etc., but I love that it doesn’t take up much of the book itself. And there are truly loads of great recipes, each with complete nutrition information. Highly recommended for anyone who loves to cook delicious low carb food.
customer_reviews.author: S. Emigh

customer_reviews.title: This.
customer_reviews.text: If you were at all confused, or curious, or unsure of how to have the perfect keto diet, this book is for you. I have a number of Keto books, and this one is by far my favorite. Get this book, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: wickedlostangel

customer_reviews.title: A must for the Keto beginner
customer_reviews.text: A great source if you're new to the Keto Diet. Fun, easy recipes...most are real winners that we've made several times. Plus it's fun showing the book cover to those folks who ask "how did you loose all that weight?" Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Low quality copy
customer_reviews.text: No page numbers, no table of contents, no recipe index - makes it very hard to navigate. Buy the paper copy - kindle copy horrible!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Hudson

customer_reviews.title: This is the only book you'll ever need, especially if you're a Keto diet beginner.
customer_reviews.text: I was prepared to find this bk to be like all the other Keto diet books I've read and/or purchased. NOT SO! Each recipe tells you exactly how many calories, fat, carbs, fiber & protein you're eating if you measure everything as you prepare the recipe. It's so much easier this way. I wish I'd started with this book before wasting my money on the books I bought & will never use again. Plus, the recipes are delicious. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A RIP OFF - DO NOT BUY Found out later that this book is free online
customer_reviews.text: Found out later that this book is free online, why did I pay $30+ for someone to do a terrible job of printing and binding this "book"? DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Its a recipe book for BACON!
customer_reviews.text: I feel silly saying this but it would be awesome if this had pictures of at the least, the final product. However, we have tried several recipe's and they always taste amazing... I mean, its Bacon, why would it not!?
customer_reviews.author: James Powers

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not the ultimate ketogenic diet cookbook
customer_reviews.text: There are about 15 Keto cookbooks I would recommend ahead of this one. Compared to all the other Keto cookbooks I have, this one has less dietary information and less recipes. In addition, at least half the recipes are basics that you see all over the place (like kale chips and cauliflower mac & cheese). I also really enjoy seeing photos of the dishes and this book doesn’t have many. It’s not horrible but there are way better Keto cookbooks out there with more information and inspiring dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Ketogenic recipes made simple
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplicity and practicality of the recipes. It covers a wide range of menus, sauces, smoothies, deserts, fish, meats and vegetables. Would like to see more bread recipes using coconut and almond flour. However given the many creative suggestions and ideas in the book guess I can certainly improvise by merging and combining menus in the book. Highly recommend this book!
customer_reviews.author: General  (2010)

customer_reviews.title: No photos
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Not one single photo in the whole book. Will look into returning. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Buffy Mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Live that the recipes use regular ingredients found in normal ...
customer_reviews.text: Live that the recipes use regular ingredients found in normal kitchens. Don’t have to go to the health food store every time I want to cook something
customer_reviews.author: fvlaceym

customer_reviews.title: This book has some good recipes, but it also falls into some of ...
customer_reviews.text: This book has some good recipes, but it also falls into some of the same traps that most keto dieters (or any dieter) experience. Just because it can be called keto does not make it healthy. If you are new to keto I would suggest looking into Maria Emmerich's books first.
customer_reviews.author: L_H

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Keto Information.
customer_reviews.text: First off, even though this book was helpful in getting started on the Keto diet know that you will not live on just bacon and butter, but they are definitely included in the Keto diet. After I read this book I did order a couple more books for more in depth information but that is the way I usually do things, I want other ideas and opinions. This book does give you the basics and good recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Informative
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried the Keto diet yet as I like to be well informed before doing things like this. What impressed me about this book was it was just basics. It didn't bore you with chapter after chapter of medical jargon, but instead gave references to find the medical side if you wanted it. I like the list of websites at the end to get you started and the apps list was useful too. If you are looking for a "quick start guide" to the Keto diet, this is it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Yummy recipes!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Keto cookbook!! I've made three of the recipes so far, and I love them all. My favorite so far is the cauliflower mac and cheese, it is delicious. I look foreword to trying many more very soon. I also like that all of the macros for every recipe are printed right on the side of the page for easy reference.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Love the food in here but the title of the book is alittle misleading. it's more low-carb & "Keto friendly." As not everything is Keto but with some small substitution it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far I've only had the chance to try a few recipes but I liked them very much!! This is a very complete, easy to understand ketogenic cookbook and believe me... I've bought a few...with less than satisfactory results as far as taste and texture go! Very impressed so far, and glad I bought this. Can't wait to try more!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: The real deal...TRULY keto
customer_reviews.text: There are tons of free or cheap Keto book books out there now. Most are really high in carbs and focus on fake substitute foods. This one is worth paying for. Explains Keto well, lots of TRULY Keto recipes without too many weird ingredients, and full information on macros per serving. This is the only one I use.
customer_reviews.author: BroadchurchBaby

customer_reviews.title: Bacon & Butter Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Cover and pages were all crisp, however many of the pages were dogeared - perhaps to mark the reader's place (there was also a shopping list in the book - perhaps used as a reference while shopping?) Basically are a very nice book for the money. I straightened out the pages and it'll work just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: avid shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good east to make recipes
customer_reviews.text: Yummy recipes not too difficult to make. Usually 4-6 ingredients but some of the main courses go up to 12. All still common keto ingredients like almond flour, heavy cream, chicken thighs. Minus 1 star for lack of recipe pictures. The video provides a flip through.
customer_reviews.author: JoxBox

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This book is a must! I have purchased other ketogenic cookbooks that were clearly lacking in flavor. The author of this book cooks and obviously enjoys flavorful food. I have made a number of the recipes and have not had to "doctor" any of them. In fact, I just searched to see if she has authored any other cookbooks, sadly she has not. Hope she's woking on one.
customer_reviews.author: Margo C. Limmer

customer_reviews.title: Keto
customer_reviews.text: This books contains some very good advice and answers many questions about beginning a keto diet. There are some very good recipes at the end that can help you get started, what to buy and how to keep track of macros.
customer_reviews.author: All-access Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto Cookbook EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best Keto diet cookbook in the world. Seriously. I've recommended this to ever single one of my friends who are also dieting. LOVE LOVE LOVE this book!! Get it today! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JennyReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting food
customer_reviews.text: just the recipes alone are worth the book., I don't do the Ketogenic Diet itself, but I love the sugar and salt reduced recipes for ketchup and BBQ Sauce. Its great!
customer_reviews.author: Watcher

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had more photos, but the recipes are sound and the education is sound, so it is passes in this house. There are a lot of very inaccurate keto cookbooks out there and this one isn't one of them. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Drescher

customer_reviews.title: Recipes are wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Liked this cookbook and had some solid meals with it that are now part of my normal rotation (chicken piccata). BUT then I tried the Pot Roast. Common sense should have told me something was wrong, but I still followed it. And after 6 hours uncovered at 400degrees my 4.5lb roast was burnt to smitherings. Good for inspiration, bad for actual execution.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: The (Fat)BOMB.COM!
customer_reviews.text: I have found so many delish recipes in this book! I love, love, LOVE the fat bomb recipes - there are so many things you can do with them! From just a simple fat bomb, to a topping on a delish lowcarb brownie or lowcarb ice cream. Seriously. Best LCHF recipe book I've bought yet!
customer_reviews.author: Silly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Recipes are good -- but not worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: It's alright. I was hoping it would have more pictures.. and pictures of the actual food, not just semi-related stock photos. You can find most of the recipes online. EDIT: This review was hidden by the "sensitive filter?" What on earth?
customer_reviews.author: David Z

customer_reviews.title: Pinterest has better options than this book
customer_reviews.text: Very unimpressed with this book! First, the quality of the book is very subpar. It looks and feels as if someone printed it at home and bound it themselves. Literally just regular printer paper. The quality of the photos is grainy as is the printing of headlines and such. The recipes are for the most novice of cooks. One recipe is Ham and Cheese roll ups. Really? We need a recipe for that? Another recipe is for "cheesy pizza crust" aka fat head dough. Anyone on keto knows how to make Fat Head, don't try to replicate it. All in all, this was a waste of money. Sending back the same day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Keto in Pearls

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I like the cookbook very much but recently realized its missing pages in last half of book. Blank pages not printed. Figured it out when missing pages in glossary. Ugh a bit frustrated with that! Double check yours when u get it....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great meals for real people
customer_reviews.text: I have found some really good simple meal ideas in this. Other books required ingredients I had to search for and a lot of these ingredients I already had in my home. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: T. Minor

customer_reviews.title: Lifestyle Change
customer_reviews.text: I’m changing my way of eating for the new year. I read about The Bacon and Butter and decided to give it a try. I am impressed with some of the recipes I have tried. They look and taste like the high carb versions. It is much easier to maintain this new lifestyle when I don’t feel deprived. I highly recommend this book.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia D. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Keto diet way of eating
customer_reviews.text: I am just beginning to study the Ketogenic diet, and have only made a couple recipes from this book, but the food is delicious and certainly doesn't seem like "diet" food. The recipes are easy to follow, and I think this type of diet is definately worth further study.
customer_reviews.author: Busy granny

customer_reviews.title: Love this book and have used some of the recipes ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this book and have used some of the recipes over and over, like the cabbage slow, the jalapeno poppers, the pulled pork, all are so good!
customer_reviews.author: Oregonian

customer_reviews.title: This book is pretty much void
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked at this in reviews... I cannot address any cookbook without pictures of all the recipes. This book is pretty much void. A-viod it.
customer_reviews.author: johnny gato

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Recipes, Excellent Advice
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain! The Kindle price was low and I got much more than my money's worth. The book is very informative and even helps you deal with unsupportive family and friends. Best of all the recipes I've tried have all been delicious and not at all difficult to prepare. Even though I live in a rural area ingredients have been available at the local grocery. It's one of my pet peeves to have to hunt down exotic ingredients that are hard to find. Cook, eat and be healthy and happy.
customer_reviews.author: EAL

customer_reviews.title: Dieting.. but not starving!
customer_reviews.text: A new year, a new me right? I researched a lot of different diets, and I was given Bacon & Butter to review in exchange for my honest opinion. When dieting you always fear staying away from specific foods such as....bacon and butter! This book has given me a great explanation of what can and cannot be eaten on a Ketogenic diet. It also explains the basis of a Ketogenic diet where you are using high fat and low carbs as your diet. This book has great recipes from entrees to desserts. Great to read on my Kindle in the kitchen as I am preparing food.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sessa

customer_reviews.title: Seems ok
customer_reviews.text: Some of the ingredients used seem questionable when I am trying to improve health. Ingredients like diet cola and canola oil. But there are definitely recipes I’ll make.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Zaiser

customer_reviews.title: This cookbook is AMAZING! The recipes are delicious and pretty easy with ...
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook is AMAZING! The recipes are delicious and pretty easy with not too many ingredients. I love that all recipes either fall in the 3:1 or 4:1 fat ratio category which makes getting your keto macro percentages easier. It also has the macro breakdown and calories to help as well. Overall, love this cookbook and have shared recipes from it with friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookbook! It’s very informative and helpful for people who are just starting keto and/or don’t have a lot of time to plan. Also the recipes are great! Our favorite is the cauliflower Mac and cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent recipes
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this cookbook. Out of all the Keto cookbooks I have this one is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Great Reference for Keto Recipes
customer_reviews.text: Watched a few KetoDad food prep videos, this was his favorite cookbook and the recipes he made looked so good I had to order!! Everything has been very good so far!! The scones are to die for!
customer_reviews.author: Faith H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great recipe book. The recipes are fun and tasty for a Keto diet and works for paleo even. Very simple quick recipes with a ton of flavor. I will say it does have many recipes for a nice couple of months of Keto, but after that things will get repetitive. Get creative with them and maybe use them as inspiration for your own recipes. Overall love it!
customer_reviews.author: Meagann

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just now starting out on my Ketogenic diet lifestyle and wanted to find more recipes that included dairy in them and this book has everything I asked for! All the recipes are very straight forward with nothing "weird" in them, I'm know my hubby will love them too!
customer_reviews.author: dvinedsignd

customer_reviews.title: Great Keto cookbook
customer_reviews.text: My sister wanted this book, I ordered it for myself to read through it, my wife looked through it and lost 30lbs so for. My sister hasn’t lost any weight yet......nor has she seen it:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good recipes!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite Keto cookbooks. This has some good recipes that I think were actually well planned instead of thrown together like so many others.
customer_reviews.author: Lee M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Another good book. Help with recipes and explains thing too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Collection of Recipes
customer_reviews.text: This is a really tasty collection of recipes, including sauces and condiments that are quite helpful. I've read through the entire book and look forward to trying all the recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Lovin' San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Good book, good recipe
customer_reviews.text: Recipe were very tasty, simple and easy to follow. I did not think i couls eat a rasberry scone while on keto... they are very tasty! The only drawback are the lack of pictures.
customer_reviews.author: emilie

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the Kindle version unless you want loose pages
customer_reviews.text: Great book. I had the Kindle version, but I wanted it in print. Unfortunately, the pages started coming out of the binding. Otherwise, it would've gotten 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: BEST Keto Book Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best Keto books I have ever bought. It is in my top 3. Excellent easy to manage recipes. AND TASTY TOO
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Mantia

customer_reviews.title: Not any good
customer_reviews.text: Every recipe I tried was boring or strange. Cook times were way off. It was as if an amateur had written the recipes. (...and with a husband with lactose-intolerance, this just doesn't work for us. Too many recipes call for cheese.)
customer_reviews.author: R olafur

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this book.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two keto cookbooks at the same time, and hoped they wouldn't have a lot of the same recipes. They don't. This book is chock-full of great recipes, and even includes some to make your own condiments, sauces, and dressings.
customer_reviews.author: April Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Ketogenic Diet...Eat Fat!!
customer_reviews.text: The Ketogenic Diet is miraculous,and look what you can eat. Lost 21 pounds in one month. Type 2 diabetic symptoms fading into oblivion. i.e. my A1c down from 8+ to 6.2 and still going. Also get Keto Clarity, a must for good health.
customer_reviews.author: OneBigBear

customer_reviews.title: Tested recipes that work
customer_reviews.text: Easy recipes that work, unlike other books that seem to have untested recipes. Also, great for loosing weight. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Has some pretty good ideas and recipes
customer_reviews.text: Has some pretty good ideas and recipes ....and the plus is every recipes breaks down the macros for you which is great for keto. A few of the recipes were great and some ...not so much ...DO NOT try the keto mug cake!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Olson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent recipes, great general info if you're new to Keto
customer_reviews.text: Really fantastic general selection of recipes - I especially liked the entire section on how to make your own Keto-friendly staples like ketchup and BBQ sauce.
customer_reviews.author: KBBlakk

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Recipes
customer_reviews.text: I have made several recipes out of this book since receiving it, most of the measurements and instructions are way off. I wouldn’t recommend this book unless you really know how to cook and know what to avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Kandice Young

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Guide to Keto!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently started my Keto journey and I found this book extremely helpful. There is a good mixture of general information and delicious recipes. I’ve made some of the recipes already and I’m not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Great book but made very thin and delicate so don’t use this in the kitchen with you cause soon as you spill something on it it’s over lol
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best Keto books I have read yet. It is detailed and very easy to understand and follow. The recipes look fantastic and can't wait to try them. Even hubby will like them. Will have to see if there are other books by Ms. Richoux. You won't regret getting this and I believe one you will use often.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Talbott

customer_reviews.title: I like that it went in depth about foods to eat ...
customer_reviews.text: Before reading Bacon & Butter: The Ultimate Ketogenic Diet Cookbook, I had never heard of a Ketogenic diet. I could not wait to start reading it. Who wouldn’t want more bacon in their diet! There were so many recipes to try. My family read the book as well and they were excited for me to make some of the recipes. They were excited to try to make them their selves as well. I like that it went in depth about foods to eat while on the ketogenic diet. I would definitely recommend this book!
customer_reviews.author: Alana L.

customer_reviews.title: Hood recipes
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of information just recipes which is ok but I'm looking for more information on days and protein ratio
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ferch

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked all of the recipes, just found some of keto information to be questionable or contrary.
customer_reviews.author: gail

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Fairly disappointed. A couple good recipes but nothing for side options and a lot of the recipes had more than half my net carbs for the day! Very few dessert options also.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Appealing recipes
customer_reviews.text: Didn't see any recipes that I wouldn't make. All were appealing. Just starting diet and this book will be an asset.
customer_reviews.author: Patmarie985

customer_reviews.title: Great starter cookbook for keto lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: I really like that all of the nutritional information was listed , as well as the fat/ other macro ratios. The fat bomb recipes look really good and I like the forward part that explains the keto lifestyle in detail . Money well spent .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this... disappointed, I should have looked at the other bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Cmz

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Every recipe in this book is delicious. Starting a new diet is always scary and hard, especially when there are as many rules as Keto has. This book helped transition me into a low carb lifestyle and I can’t wait to be one of the many success stories :)
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for starting keto
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes. I make the double chocolate brownies all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Rones

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recipes are easy to follow. Some of the Marcos are off.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Keto Publication!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like seeing a sticker on my book from thrift store "Goodwill" for $2.99? Excellent book...
customer_reviews.author: Summerface

customer_reviews.title: Has some interesting recipes!
customer_reviews.text: We are keto beginners. This has some easy great sounding recipes which we want to try! Easy to read with simple, uncomplicated recipes.
customer_reviews.author: wendyb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Recipes. Heavy on Dairy.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing recipes (except the cinnamon rolls.. lol). My only warning is that the author uses A LOT of dairy and doesn't provide substitutions. Still, I recommend this book a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bacon Lover?
customer_reviews.text: If you're a bacon lover, this is the book for you...chock full of great recipes!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good Keto Book
customer_reviews.text: Seriously great recipe ideas. Beats the Keto boredom, good ideas, not terrible on the budget.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Oz Show the Chocolate Brownies in this Book should be trademarked LOL they are to die for I add walnut in the mix and onto the t
customer_reviews.text: Seen Celby on Dr. Oz Show the Chocolate Brownies in this Book should be trademarked LOL they are to die for I add walnut in the mix and onto the top for the extra fat this is one of the best books out there, outstanding piece of work.
customer_reviews.author: Coco P

customer_reviews.title: Fun recipes
customer_reviews.text: THESE RECIPES ARE FUN TO TRY AND EVERYONE LOVES TO JOIN IN AND SOMEONE IS ALWAYS ASKING FOR THE RECIPES..I DOWNLOADED THIS BOOK ON MY KINDLE AFTER LOANING MY BOOK AND NOT SURPRISING,I NEVER GOT IT BACK.
customer_reviews.author: TOM ROBERTS

customer_reviews.title: Great Keto book! Full of great info and great recipes
customer_reviews.text: Short, easy to understand. But the real value in this great book are the TONS of delicious recipes included, organized in an easy-to-access way. YUM!
customer_reviews.author: Colored Ink

customer_reviews.title: Great resource
customer_reviews.text: Great Keto recipient. I do with there were allot more images of the dishes though. Very thankful for all the sauces!
customer_reviews.author: wenditos

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This book is a great book for anyone staring a ketogenic journey. Great recipes that are simple and flavorful, including condiment recipes!
customer_reviews.author: K. Kalinine

customer_reviews.title: No pictures
customer_reviews.text: I would love this book more if it had pictures... seeing the pictures is what makes me want to cook it and I like having a general idea of what it’s supposed to come out looking like
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Great ideas. Bad nutrition calculation
customer_reviews.text: Has great ideas, how to make them and how long. Opens up your keto world with many meal options and you will be eating good. However when making the items in the book figure out the calories and macros yourself, doing the math on some of the simple ones found them to be way off. Would have been nice to see brands and if organic or not on what they used to make the recipes. Overall great book
customer_reviews.author: kayla Koudelka

customer_reviews.title: Bacon & Butter: The Ultimate Ketogenic Diet Co... by Celby Richoux
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for easy low carb recipes as I get bored with the same foods everyday. Because I have a diabetic in the house I always try new tasty items. Particularly liked the new receipe using caulaflower Mac and cheese and caulaflower rice. Will be trying new, New item a this coming week. Thanks so much for new ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Nicotera

customer_reviews.title: Super yummy, easy recipes for ketosis
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookbook! I have purchased several cookbooks with the low carb, high fat recipes that support a ketogenic diet, and this is by far my favorite. The recipes are very accessible and don't include a lot of specialty ingredients. This is a must buy for people who love to cook and are striving for ketosis.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Keto is the way to go !!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really used it yet, but I'm sure it will have some good recipes and ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Kim E.

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice book, promotes High fats the good fat of ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice book, promotes High fats the good fat of course moderate protein low carbs and no sugar has some very good cooking ideas in it
customer_reviews.author: D.p.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Just starting the keto diet and this cookbook is ideal! It has easy to do recipes and they all taste fabulous so far
customer_reviews.author: Kris Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good read great recipes
customer_reviews.text: The only thing i would add is a picture with each recipe. I like to see what i will be making
customer_reviews.author: Katy S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Bacon & Butter Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Of all the keto books I have bought this is one the best, in my opinion. Really, really good recipes, well-organized, and not overly complicated. I would definitely recommend this book.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn S. Bonner

customer_reviews.title: A true valid resource!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this book! It is simple and very easy to read and understand. It actually has resources that are outstanding. This book is chocked full of information! It is worthy of the read and is safe! I plan on keeping it at my finger tips for daily reference. This has THE BEST web links for keto out there you will not be disappointed! Get it Use it!
customer_reviews.author: Texaswonder

customer_reviews.title: Opens up the World of Keto Eating
customer_reviews.text: I loved the tasty options available in this book. I never thought to try pork rind nachos! I also will love the peanut butter cookie recipe and the homemade sauce section is going to make food interesting again.
customer_reviews.author: B in NV

product_meta.title: Bacon & Butter: The Ultimate Ketogenic Diet Cookbook
